metadata.description: Take one part bloodsucker, one part magician, one part ruthless huntress, and throw in a little bondage. What do you get? An all-out battle where arrows fly, teeth gnash, and magic spells clash. Who will survive? Find out in "Fifty Shades of the Twilight Games,? the new graphic novel parody from Bluewater Productions.
metadata.name: Fifty Shades of the Twilight Games
